title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง 2.6 - Location and hours
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง 2.6 - Location and hours

State Regulations

The time to obtain copies of and inspect department records
shall be during all hours the department is regularly open for business at the
following department offices: (1)

Main
office: Records Access Officer, Building 5, State Office Campus, 1220

Washington Avenue, Albany, NY 12232, (518) 457-2123. (2)

Counties of Albany, Essex, Greene, Rensselaer, Saratoga, Schenectady, Warren, Washington: Administrative Officer, NYSDOT, Region 1, 84 Holland Avenue, Albany, NY 12208, (518)
473-0660. (3)

Counties of Herkimer, Fulton, Hamilton, Madison, Montgomery, Oneida: Administraive Officer, NYSDOT, Region 2, Utica State Office Building, 207 Genesee Street, Utica, NY 13501, (315) 793-2387. (4)

Counties of

Cayuga, Seneca, Cortland, Onondaga, Oswego, Tompkins, Wayne: Administrative

Officer, NYSDOT, Region 3, Sycracuse State Office Building, 333 East Washington

Street, Syracuse, NY 13202, (315) 428-4325. (5)

Counties of Genesee, Livingston, Monroe, Ontario, Wyoming, Orleans: Administrative Officer, NYSDOT, Region 4, 1530

Jefferson Road, Rochester, NY 14623, (716) 272-3338. (6)

Counties of Cattaraugus, Chautauqua, Erie, Niagara: Administrative Officer, NYSDOT, Region 5, 125 Main Street, Buffalo, NY 14203, (716) 847-3284. (7)

Counties of Allegany, Chemung, Schuyler, Steuben, Tioga, Yates: Administrative Officer, NYSDOT, Region 6, 30 West Main

Street, Hornell, NY 14843, (607) 324-1900. (8)

Counties of Clinton, Franklin, Jefferson, Lewis, St. Lawrence: Administrative Officer, NYSDOT, Region 7, Watertown State

Office Building, 317 Washington Street, Watertown, NY 13601, (315)
785-2283. (9)

Counties of Columbia, Dutchess, Orange, Putnam, Rockland, Ulster, Westchester: Personnel Officer, NYSDOT, Region 8, 4 Burnett Boulevard, Poughkeepsie, NY 12603, (914)
431-5950. (10)

Counties of Broome, Chenango, Delaware, Otsego, Schoharie, Sullivan: Administrative Officer, Region
9, 81 State Street, Binghamton, NY 13901-3330, (607) 773-7740. (11)

Counties of Suffolk and Nassau: Personnel Officer, NYSDOT, Region 10, New York State Office Building, Veterans

Highway, Hauppauge, NY 11787, (516) 360-6153. (12)

New York City: Administrative Officer, NYSDOT, Region 11, Two World Trade Center, New York, NY 10047, (212)
938-3324. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 17ยง
2.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
